desc: Thoughtful and unique gift for anyone who writes, journals or draws! Treat yourself to something that's worthy of holding the contents of your beautiful mind. Your secrets. Your hopes and dreams. Your highest self. They demand more than any old piece of paper! They deserve the divine.

layout.text: Divine Journals. A worthy Home for your Beautiful Mind.
No Tax! Free Shipping worldwide! Satisfaction guaranteed. We just want to make you smile :)
